Breadth-First.Explanation: Generic introduction signaling the start of broad clue collection and image overview
Divergent listing of man-made object clues without a narrowed hypothesis
Continued broad listing of natural element clues without convergence on a specific location

Depth-First.Explanation: Derives a specific regional hypothesis (German-speaking area) and shifts to focused verification
Presents a final specific location hypothesis (Bavaria, Germany), converging the analysis

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Moved from broad clue listing to forming and focusing on a concrete regional hypothesis
